message.content:
cs.DL, cs.DC, cs.IR, cs.CY, cs.CR 

The paper discusses the cash-per-publication reward policy in China, which is related to the publication and dissemination of scientific research. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.DL (Digital Libraries) which deals with the organization, management, and dissemination of digital information. Other likely sub-categories include cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) which deals with the efficient processing and storage of large amounts of data, cs.IR (Information Retrieval) which deals with the search and retrieval of information from large datasets, cs.CY (Computers and Society) which deals with the social and ethical implications of technology, and cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) which deals with the protection of information and data.
